name: Hololive Cover Quiz
description:
Test your Hololive knowledge and your hearing skills! Can you guess who is the one singing the song? 「Disclaimer」

My work and I do not represent COVER Corp or Hololive Production. 

This is a fan-made non-commercial project; there's no form of monetization in this game. All songs used are short snippets of the full covers that can be found on YouTube. I do not own the rights to any of the songs used. All rights reserved to their respective owners.

「Game Features」

Current version: 1.2

  • Test your knowledge and listening skills, and guess the singer for the cover of 10 randomly picked songs.
  • Currently, there's a total of 30 possible songs.
  • More features coming soon!

You can find the list of all the songs used in the quiz here. Note: some songs have yet to be added into the game.

「Patch Notes」

v1.2 patch notes (30/8/2021)

  • Added additional details for song clarity.
  • Added a Return button at result screen, instead of clicking anywhere to return.
  • Added 9 new songs into the library.
  • Changed resolution to 16:9.
  • Fixed the link to source issues.
  • Updated instructions for clarity.
「Developer Notes」

This is just a game I've developed for fun to take some stress off myself. I'll probably update this project with additional song choices depending on the reception of the project.
